DOC.brief_summary: This is a 2-3 period parallel group study with an adaptive element in Type 2 diabetes patients receiving vildagliptin as monotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Long-Term Safety of Vildagliptin as Monotherapy in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Patients at least 18 years of age at Visit 1 Drug naïve patients with T2DM diagnosed at least 2 months prior to Visit 1 HbA1c ≥ 7.0 % and ≤ 10.0% at Visit 1 Body Mass Index (BMI) in the range of 2245 kg/m2 at Visit 1 Pregnant or lactating female FPG ≥ 270 mg/dL (≥15 mmol/L) Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
